TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_tay_Macedonia, title = Macedonia, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Atayal]}, url = {https://tay.wikipedia.org/wiki/Macedonia} }

S.FORM: Macedonia hya' ga cyux maki' tay 41 50 N, 22 00 E na Oco syuw. kwara' kinghciyan niya' 25,713 sq km (maki' tay 150ginkgan kin wahci') (kinwhci' niya' ga 25,433 sq km , kinwhci' na lawsayan wsilung hya' ga 280 sq km) Kinkhmayan kwara' squliq hya' ga 2,100,025. Pinbcyan naha' sni' naha' rhzyal hya' iy pqmahun hya' ga 44.30% , lhlahuy hya' ga 39.80%, sni' naha' sa pptzyuwaw sa bzinah hya' ga 15.90%. spzyang qalang na Kokka' spzyang naha' krahu' qalang hya' ga Skopje. snyan kinramat inlungan na Kokka' snyan kinramat inlungan na Kokka' hya' ga 8 na tay mqiru' byacing na qutux kawas. mrhuw Kokka' mrhuw Kokka' ta' misuw hya' ga Stevo Pendarovski, aring ryax 12 squ byacing tay 5 sa kawas 2019 lga, musa' spazyang balay ms'rux kya la. cinkhulan sa knita' sa brbiru' CIA 外交部

Macedonia hya' ga cyox maki' tay 41 50 N, 22 00 E na Oco syow. kwara' kinghciyan niya' 25,713 sq km (maki' tay 150ginkgan kin wahci') (kinwhci' niya' ga 25,433 sq km , kinwhci' na lawsayan wsilong hya' ga 280 sq km) Kinkhmayan kwara' sqoliq hya' ga 2,100,025. Pinbcyan naha' sni' naha' rhzyal hya' iy pqmahon hya' ga 44.30% , lhlahoy hya' ga 39.80%, sni' naha' sa pptzyowaw sa bzinah hya' ga 15.90%. spzyang qalang na Kokka' spzyang naha' kraho' qalang hya' ga Skopje. snyan kinramat inlongan na Kokka' snyan kinramat inlongan na Kokka' hya' ga 8 na tay mqiro' byacing na qotox kawas. mrhow Kokka' mrhow Kokka' ta' misow hya' ga Stevo Pendarovski, aring ryax 12 sqo byacing tay 5 sa kawas 2019 lga, mosa' spazyang balay ms'rox kya la. cinkholan sa knita' sa brbiro' CIA 外交部
